predictions.text: The Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or below 12.50 on at least one trading day by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Cboe historical data or Yahoo Finance (^VIX), identify any trading day with the official closing value ≤ 12.50 on or before 2025-09-30 (U.S. market date).
monitoring_signals: Equity market breadth and megacap leadership
predictions.rationale: Calm equities, positive breadth, and contangoed vol term structure into mid-September favor at least one low-volatility close, though CPI and oil are risks.

predictions.text: USD/JPY (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X) will close at or above 152.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: On Yahoo Finance ticker JPY=X, any daily close ≥ 152.00 by 2025-09-30 (UTC) satisfies.
monitoring_signals: Japan MoF intervention rhetoric or actions
predictions.rationale: Political uncertainty and persistent U.S.–Japan rate differentials support yen weakness; intervention risk tempers odds.

predictions.text: U.S. Producer Price Index (final demand) m/m for August 2025 will be between 0.2% and 0.5% in the BLS release on 2025-09-12.
predictions.verification_criteria: As published by BLS in the Producer Price Index news release on 2025-09-12; accepts seasonally adjusted final demand m/m change in the inclusive range [0.2%, 0.5%].
monitoring_signals: ISM Manufacturing and Services Prices Paid indices
Freight costs (Drewry WCI, Baltic Dry Index)
predictions.rationale: Energy rebound and steady core goods pressures point to a moderate PPI print, likely above 0.1% but contained.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, the U.S. Department of Defense will announce at least one Ukraine security assistance package via Presidential Drawdown Authority valued at $250 million or more.
predictions.verification_criteria: A DoD press release on defense.gov explicitly labeled as a Presidential Drawdown for Ukraine with stated value ≥ $250,000,000, dated on or before 2025-09-30 (ET).
predictions.rationale: Escalating Russian strikes increase urgency; PDA packages recur roughly monthly and often exceed $250M.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31 (UTC), Cloudflare Status will post an incident citing subsea cable disruption in the Red Sea/Suez/Gulf of Aden region causing connectivity degradation or traffic rerouting.
predictions.verification_criteria: An incident on status.cloudflare.com during the window that explicitly mentions subsea cable issues in the Red Sea/Suez/Gulf of Aden and resulting latency, packet loss, or traffic rerouting.
monitoring_signals: UKMTO advisories in Red Sea/Bab el-Mandeb/Gulf of Aden
Other cloud/CDN status pages (Azure, Google Cloud, Akamai)
predictions.rationale: Recent Red Sea cable cuts hit Azure; broader routing stress makes knock-on incidents at major CDNs plausible.

predictions.text: NYMEX RBOB Gasoline front-month futures will settle at or above $2.75 per gallon on at least one trading day by 2025-10-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official daily settlement for the front-month RBOB Gasoline futures (symbol RB) ≥ $2.75/gal on or before 2025-10-15 (CT).
monitoring_signals: Gulf hurricane activity and refinery corridor impacts
Gasoline inventories by PADD (EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report)
predictions.rationale: Tighter crude balances, hurricane season risk, and low gasoline stocks could lift RBOB above $2.75 despite demand seasonality fading.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the Council of the European Union will adopt and publish in the Official Journal at least one new Russia-related restrictive measures act (package or listings).
predictions.verification_criteria: Publication in the Official Journal (eur-lex.europa.eu) of a Council Decision/Regulation amending or adding Russia-related restrictive measures dated on or before 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Member state statements (Poland, Baltics, Germany, France)
Escalation in Russian strikes on civilian infrastructure
predictions.rationale: Escalation in Ukraine and G7 coordination raise odds of at least incremental EU listings this fall.
